parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From peri and zonnumi; to gird all around, i.e. to fasten on one's belt.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The loins. Of uncertain affinity; the loin, i.e. The hip; internally procreative power.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A breast-plate, corslet, cuirass. Of uncertain affinity; the chest, i.e. a corslet.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To put on, clothe (another). From en and duno; to invest with clothing.
